name: washingContaminationLevel_decrease
description: This function is used to decrease the contamination level of a washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to decrease the contamination level.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to decrease the contamination level.

parameters.name: washingContaminationLevelDelta
parameters.description: The delta value to decrease the contamination level.
